text:
When a worksheet is cloned, the column information (columns attribute in class 
Sheet) is not being cloned to the new worksheet
creator: bstox@dkintl.com
dominik.stadler@gmx.at
text: Many bugs in this area were fixed in the meantime, if this is still a problem with the latest release, then please report a bug together with sample files/unit tests which allow to reproduce the problem.
